name: Tamer Island F2
description:
This is the fan sequel of "Tamer Island" by TheGameDawg. Continuing on the plot that the last game left off. Here we start in the far future with the protagonist: You Me. And his butterfly partner, Leafy. Having to face the forces of Monsters that want to destroy the world. Featuring new environments, advancements on old areas and 31 Monsters to collect.

If you want to download this game. You need to extract/unzip the game. You need to extract it. You need to play it.

Thank you if you decide to play this. And maybe, maybe someone else can make a fan sequel to my fan sequel.

12/17/21: Patched Mapping Glitch
